Name: Ching-Torc
LongDescription: Causes Kecleon's Shop to appear more frequently in dungeons. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chingling and Chimecho.  Finding a Ching-Torc at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
